DESCRIPTION: Add a new tag to the server
INVALID_NAME: Please specify a name for the tag.
NAME_TOO_LONG: Please shorten the name of the tag.
INVALID_RESP: Please specify a response for the tag
NEED_PREMIUM: You need premium to create more tags. Premium servers get up to `50` tags
MAX_TAGS: You have exceeded the maximium tags.
SAME_NAME: This tag has already been created.
TAGS_SAVED: Tag has been saved with name: `{{TAG}}`.
